RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUST FOR LIFE took command shortly from the gate, opened a well rated advantage, pulled clear in upper stretch and was never seriously threatened. RIVERS OF DENIRO stalked the pacesetter throughout, was unable to match the winner and finished willingly to be second best. AFTER SUNRISE tracked the leader into the turn, split rivals with a bid on the bend to loom turning for home, lugged in while tiring through the lane causing REIGNING DREAM to be in tight and steady down the lane. REIGNING DREAM raced up the fence prompting the early pace, dropped back on the turn losing positions, cut the corner turning for home and rallied up the rail down the lane while in close quarters. HEZA PISTOL broke a step slow to be at the rear, rushed up down the backside to contend, rallied six wide in the turn with an early bid and finished evenly passing weakening rivals in the lane. C V DYNAMIC well placed while caught five wide in the turn and lacked a closing response. KELLEHER was never a threat. ONE STEP ASIDE was not a factor. THE STEWARDS POSTED AN INQUIRY INTO THE STRETCH RUN AND THE RIDER OF REIGNING DREAM CLAIMED FOUL FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH RUN, UPON REVIEW THE STEWARDS PLACED AFTER SUNRISE FOURTH FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH.

ENTRY.NAME: Reigning Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back turn, saved ground, rail rally, in tight stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lust for Life
ENTRY.OWNER: HMD Racing Stables LLC and Taste of Victory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, pulled clear, not threatened

ENTRY.NAME: C V Dynamic
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, 5 wide, no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Pistol
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, rushed up, early bid, even late, passed tired

ENTRY.NAME: Kelleher
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-After Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, split rivals turn, bid, lugged in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers of Deniro
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid, failed to gain, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KERANOS stalked the pace from three wide, made a steady advance on the turn to engage the leaders turning for home and drew clear convincingly. DOMI tracked the leaders through the turn, rallied willingly down the lane to gain the place while no match for the winner. MAS ORO dueled on the lead from the rail, briefly surrendered the lead in the turn, regained the lead turning for home and kept on well through the stretch. SWELTER well placed just off the pace down the backside, dropped back losing position in the turn and came on again late down the lane. MINDSHIP Q raced wide through the turn and in the stretch while showing some late interest. OUTSLEWTHEM bobbled slightly leaving the gate, hustled up two wide to duel on the pace briefly taking the lead in the turn and tired in the stretch. BELL CURVE was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: duel inside, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Swelter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, dropped back, came on late

ENTRY.NAME: Bell Curve
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Mindship Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced wide, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, finished willingly, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bobble, pressed pace, brief lead, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Keranos
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, steady advance, convincingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNTEVERYBLESSING bumped by outside rival leaving the gate to be near the rear early, rallied three wide with an early bid in the turn to take command turning for home, repelled the challenge of the runner-up in mid-stretch and pulled away nearing the wire. JUSTA LITTLE MOORE broke inward to bump rival, raced up mid-pack down the backside, had to be hard held off heels, found racing room on the bend angling to the rail to cut the corner turning for home, challenged the winner in the lane and was out-finished. LIVING THE DREAM reserved off the pace to the quarter pole and rallied willingly in the lane to be the best of the rest. SHAKE THE FROST pressed the pace from three wide through the turn and finished evenly down the lane. STRIKING LAD raced near the rear of the field to the head of the stretch, angled six wide and showed some late interest. LUCKY VICTOR tracked the leaders through the turn and failed to respond with a closing rally. AKIMBO showed brief speed and gave way. SEEKING FREEDOM failed to menace. TAHLEQUAH JOE sped up between rivals to duel on the early pace, took command in the turn and tired turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Akimbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled 6 wide, late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking Freedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Tahlequah Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: duel, split rivals, led, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Living the Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, stretch rally, willingly, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Counteveryblessing
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rally 3 wide, repelled challenge, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Justa Little Moore
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke into rival, hard held, cut corner, bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Shake the Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid 3 wide, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Victor
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, failed to respond

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 49. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAVESOMEFORME pressed the pace from between rivals into the turn, rallied determinedly through the lane and prevailed late in the drive. SWEET AS MERRIE set a pressured pace to the head of the lane, briefly opened the advantage in mid-stretch and was outkicked late in the lane. HALO EFFECT broke outward to bump rival leaving the gate, tracked the leaders from between horses in the second flight into the turn and finished well while drifting out through the stretch. TITEBLUEJEANS reserved off the pace from three wide to the top of the lane and mounted a mild bid in the lane. DEE'S KY WILDCAT well placed early along the rail in the second group, lost position dropping back through the turn and passed tiring rivals in the lane. HAUGHTY PRAISE bumped hard by inside rival leaving the gate to be squeezed between horses and forced to the back of the pack and never menaced from there. TWILIGHT BEAUTY chased the pace from three wide to midway on the bend and faded. OHIO LADY trailed throughout as a non-factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Ky Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, lost position, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Merrie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, cleared, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Savesomeforme
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, between rivals, prevailed late, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Halo Effect
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan D and Yoder Lori D
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped rival, tracked, rallied, drifted stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Haughty Praise
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, squeezed, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 15. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weig ht Allowances) (Winners since May 15 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAVVY LAYLA set the pace shortly away from the gates, cleared in the turn, responded when called upon at the head of the lane when threatened and drew off in deep stretch. PAT DADDY prompted the pace to the quarter pole, made a threatening bid in upper stretch, was repelled and kept on well in the lane a clear second best. UNCLEJACKOMO chased the pacesetter through the turn from four wide and failed to gain ground on the top pair while holding on to the show. LOCK ON unhurried in the early going, angled out to the seven path at the head of the lane and mounted a mild bid in the lane. CALL WEST slow early to be near the back of the pack and made up positions with a late gain. ROYAL CRUSADER rated in mid-pack to the quarter pole and passed weaker down the stretch while rallying along the fence. NYOMAN contended for a half mile and flattened out in the drive. NOBLE BEHAVIOR went one paced failing to menace. CAPTAIN MAD JACK showed speed to be on the pace for a quarter mile and was through early. TIDE RISING was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy Layla
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace, clear lead, responded, drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Mad Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, bid, repelled, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Call West
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Crusader
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated mid-pack, rail rally, passed weaker

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Behavior
ENTRY.COMMENT: one-paced, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, circled 7path, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Nyoman
ENTRY.COMMENT: contended, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4 wide, failed to gain, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALEXIS N NIKO set a pressured pace from the fence, dueled through the far turn with the runner-up, shook clear in mid-stretch and drew away gamely. ONEMORANDTHECHECK pressed the pace from three wide into the backstretch, dueled with the winner through the far turn taking a brief lead and kept on well as the obvious second best in a good effort. KILLER BEE slow early to be the distant trailer, rallied into the far turn and made a steady advance to gain the show. THE EQUINEST tracked the leaders to the top of the lane saving ground and failed to gain ground. THISPOINTINTIME unhurried for the first half mile and rallied mildly passing tiring rivals in the stretch. RED COMET failed to menace. DUDEWITHTHEDIAMOND prompted the pace from five wide to the quarter pole and faded in the lane. GOTIGER SPECIAL chased the leaders from wide on the track for three quarters and never posed a threat. UNION LEAGUE showed speed for a half mile, was through early and was pulled up and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Alexis N Niko
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, battled turn, pulled away, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Union League
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, through early, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Red Comet
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Onemorandthecheck
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, bid, dueled, second best

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, saved ground, failed to gain

ENTRY.NAME: Thispointintime
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Dudewiththediamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, 5 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gotiger Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased wide, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Killer Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, steady advance, closed well for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCRIMPER settled in hand from three wide to prompt the pace to the turn, assumed command on the bend, opened a clear advantage in upper stretch and drew away while geared down late. WHO DA BOSS tracked the leaders to the turn, rallied three wide in the turn to make a bid, was no match for the winner and finished well to be second best. GAPPER slow early to trail the field, made a five wide steady advance to be up for the show. VILLIAN reserved off the pace to be near the rear of the pack, and made a mild stretch rally passed weaker rivals. ROLL ON BIG O pressed the pace for a half mile and weakened in the lane. SOCIAL HISTORY contended early, dropped back to the rear in the turn and gained position along the fence in the stretch. KINDERHOOK well placed in the early going and faded. RED CHILI PEPPER flashed speed up the fence to take the lead in the first quarter and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Chili Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, through early, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Roll On Big O
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Scrimper
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, prompt pace, assumed command, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Social History
ENTRY.OWNER: Nelson Kathryn and Nelson Jim E
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, lost position, gained position, inside

ENTRY.NAME: Villian
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hamm Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, mild bid, never menaced, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Kinderhook
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, steady advance, circled 5w, advance for show

ENTRY.NAME: Who Da Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, rallied, no match, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEED TO KNOW BASIS reserved off the pace down the backside to be mid-pack, commenced a rally into the far turn splitting rivals in the second flight, waited behind the three front-runners at the quarter pole while angling four wide, angled back to inside the drifting leader in upper stretch and pulled clear late in the drive. MUGSY MALONE stalked the pace to the far turn, made an early bid to take command nearing the quarter pole from three wide, continued to drift out turning for home and kept on through the lane while unable to match the winner. AULD LANGE SYNE well placed along the fence after settling just off the leaders, cut the corner turning for home and failed to gain on the top pair. VAIL OF HONOR slow early to be the distant trailer, closed significant ground to the turn and showed good late energy in the lane. OKLAHOMA JOE set the pace under pressure down the backside and weakened coming home. DISTORTED LIMITS went evenly failing to menace. EXONERATED PREZ was forced to be well wide in the first turn, dropped to the rail down the backstretch and was never a threat having failed to mount a closing rally when called upon. DEVIL'S HARVEST pressed the pace for a half mile, made an early bid in the turn to threaten and gave way at the top of the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, saved ground, no gain

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace, pressured, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, early bid 3w, assumed command, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Harvest
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Vail of Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, passed tiring rivals, good late energy

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Need to Know Basis
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: split rivals turn, waited, angled in, closed well, pulled clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Exonerated Prez
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide 1st turn, dropped in, no threat,
